data.name: Mobilisation & Project Deadlines
data.description: Mobilisation alignment with proposed Project Plan. Mobilisation by way of all agreed resources available to work in accordance with Project Plan.
data.measurement_method: Availability of agreed resources in accordance with SoW Project Plan. Monthly review.
data.data_source: Project Plan and Resource Availability Records
data.calculation: Target number of resources mobilised ÷ total resources due across all SoWs
data.remediation: If target not met: Review resource allocation, escalate resource constraints to management, implement contingency resourcing plan within 5 working days.

data.name: Timeliness of Delivery
data.description: Timeliness of delivery against agreed Milestones. SoW Deliverables delivered on time as per project schedule.
data.measurement_method: % of milestones delivered on time (subject to change control) as measured against deliverables timeline in Section 8.0
data.calculation: Number of Deliverables issued by agreed Milestone ÷ total due deliverables across all SoWs
data.remediation: If target not met: Conduct root cause analysis, implement recovery plan, escalate blockers to governance meeting within 3 working days.

data.name: First Time Quality of Deliverables
data.description: Approval of delivery quality in accordance with Acceptance Criteria. Alignment with standards and design principles at first review.
data.measurement_method: Accuracy, completeness, and clarity of documentation (as per Quality Standards in Section 12.0). Deliverables approved at first review.
data.data_source: Deliverable Review Records and Acceptance Sign-offs
data.calculation: Number of Deliverables approved by GoJ SoW Manager (in accordance with acceptance criteria) at first review ÷ total Deliverables reviewed
data.remediation: If target not met: Implement enhanced QA review process, provide additional training on standards, increase peer review coverage.

data.name: First Time Quality of Deliverables
data.description: Approval of delivery quality in accordance with Acceptance Criteria. Alignment with standards and design principles at first review.
data.measurement_method: Accuracy, completeness, and clarity of documentation (as per Quality Standards in Section 12.0). Deliverables approved at first review.
data.data_source: Deliverable Review Records and Acceptance Sign-offs
data.calculation: Number of Deliverables approved by GoJ SoW Manager (in accordance with acceptance criteria) at first review ÷ total Deliverables reviewed
data.remediation: If target not met: Implement enhanced QA review process, provide additional training on standards, increase peer review coverage.
data.DELETE_REASON: No project_id, older record, unit='percent' instead of '%'

data.name: Second Time Quality of Deliverables
data.description: Satisfaction of GoJ with delivery quality in accordance with Acceptance Criteria after remediation. Alignment with standards and design principles at second review.
data.measurement_method: Second review of accuracy, completeness, and clarity of documentation (as per Quality Standards in Section 12.0)
data.data_source: Deliverable Review Records and Remediation Log
data.calculation: Number of Deliverables approved by GoJ SoW Manager (in accordance with remediation plan and acceptance criteria) at second review ÷ total Deliverables reviewed
data.remediation: If target not met: Escalate to senior management, implement mandatory third-party review, conduct lessons learned session.

data.name: Second Time Quality of Deliverables
data.description: Satisfaction of GoJ with delivery quality in accordance with Acceptance Criteria after remediation. Alignment with standards and design principles at second review.
data.measurement_method: Second review of accuracy, completeness, and clarity of documentation (as per Quality Standards in Section 12.0)
data.data_source: Deliverable Review Records and Remediation Log
data.calculation: Number of Deliverables approved by GoJ SoW Manager (in accordance with remediation plan and acceptance criteria) at second review ÷ total Deliverables reviewed
data.remediation: If target not met: Escalate to senior management, implement mandatory third-party review, conduct lessons learned session.
data.DELETE_REASON: No project_id, older record, unit='percent' instead of '%'

data.name: Proactive Partnership
data.description: Supplier participation in GoJ governance and planning. Attendance at scheduled SoW Governance and Reporting Meetings and provision of regular monthly reports.
data.measurement_method: Participation in GoJ scheduled governance and planning meetings. Quarterly review of attendance records.
data.data_source: Meeting Attendance Records and Monthly Reports
data.calculation: Number of governance meetings participated in ÷ total number of governance meetings
data.remediation: If target not met: Review scheduling conflicts, ensure backup attendees are assigned, escalate participation issues to account management.

data.name: Responsiveness
data.description: Effectiveness of issue/risk escalation. Contractor to keep risk log accurately updated with agreed severity categorisation of risks and issues.
data.measurement_method: Provision of, and maintaining of, a risk log through duration of SoW. Measured at regular SoW governance and reporting meetings.
data.data_source: Risk Log and Governance Meeting Minutes
data.calculation: Risk log is current and captures all high/critical risks with only minor omissions when reviewed by SoW Manager. No critical 1 or 2 risks omitted.
data.remediation: If target not met: Implement daily risk review process, assign dedicated risk owner, conduct risk management training session.

data.name: Responsiveness
data.description: Effectiveness of issue/risk escalation. Contractor to keep risk log accurately updated with agreed severity categorisation of risks and issues.
data.measurement_method: Provision of, and maintaining of, a risk log through duration of SoW. Measured at regular SoW governance and reporting meetings.
data.data_source: Risk Log and Governance Meeting Minutes
data.calculation: Risk log is current and captures all high/critical risks with only minor omissions when reviewed by SoW Manager. No critical 1 or 2 risks omitted.
data.remediation: If target not met: Implement daily risk review process, assign dedicated risk owner, conduct risk management training session.
data.DELETE_REASON: No project_id, older record, unit='percent' instead of '%'

data.name: Communication & Collaboration
data.description: Consistency in communication and stakeholder engagement. GoJ SoW Manager & Senior stakeholder satisfaction with Contractor collaboration.
data.measurement_method: Effectiveness of collaboration with GoJ teams. Outcomes from Monthly Project Retrospective (Start/Stop/Continue). Evidenced impact from reported outcomes.
data.data_source: Stakeholder Satisfaction Survey and Retrospective Records
data.calculation: Number of satisfied stakeholders ÷ total stakeholders surveyed
data.remediation: If target not met: Conduct stakeholder feedback session, implement communication improvement plan, increase touchpoint frequency.

data.name: Planning & Reporting
data.description: Maintenance of up-to-date exit plans and IP documentation. Exit Plan Deliverables are up to date.
data.measurement_method: Measured against deliverable (Section 8.0) under item 10. Documentation and IP is up to date.
data.data_source: Exit Plan Document and IP Register
data.calculation: Number of Exit Plan deliverables achieved ÷ total deliverables due across all SoWs
data.remediation: If target not met: Prioritise exit plan updates, assign dedicated documentation resource, implement weekly review cadence.

data.name: Documentation Quality
data.description: Effectiveness of knowledge sharing and handover. Readiness to transition back to GoJ or third parties. Knowledge transfer deliverables tracked and delivered on time.
data.measurement_method: Completion of successful handover and knowledge sharing of SoW findings through scheduled knowledge transfer sessions.
data.data_source: Knowledge Transfer Session Records and Feedback Forms
data.calculation: Number of knowledge transfer deliverables achieved ÷ total deliverables due across all SoWs
data.remediation: If target not met: Schedule additional KT sessions, provide supplementary documentation, extend handover period if needed.
data.DELETE_REASON: No project_id, older record, unit='percent' instead of '%'

data.name: Documentation Quality
data.description: Effectiveness of knowledge sharing and handover. Readiness to transition back to GoJ or third parties. Knowledge transfer deliverables tracked and delivered on time.
data.measurement_method: Completion of successful handover and knowledge sharing of SoW findings through scheduled knowledge transfer sessions.
data.data_source: Knowledge Transfer Session Records and Feedback Forms
data.calculation: Number of knowledge transfer deliverables achieved ÷ total deliverables due across all SoWs
data.remediation: If target not met: Schedule additional KT sessions, provide supplementary documentation, extend handover period if needed.

data.name: Risk Management
data.description: Commercial transparency and budget management. Use of clear reporting and dashboards. Transparent tracking and forecasting of deliverables and spend against plan & budget.
data.measurement_method: Provision of regular monthly reporting dashboards for review and approval by GoJ Project Manager. Assessment of alignment to roles and responsibilities.
data.data_source: Monthly Dashboard Reports and Budget Tracker
data.calculation: Total Number of dashboards ÷ number of dashboards determined as current and providing agreed content. Spend/charges does not exceed budget forecast per month.
data.remediation: If target not met: Review dashboard content with stakeholders, implement automated reporting where possible, conduct budget variance analysis.

data.name: Innovation & Improvement
data.description: Evidence of continuous improvement and applied innovation. Application of industry standards and reusable intellectual property rights (IPR). Recommendations to improve architecture maturity and project outcomes.
data.measurement_method: Contained within context of SoW deliverables. Covered within stakeholder engagement and effectiveness of collaboration assessments.
data.data_source: Innovation Register and Deliverable Quality Assessments
data.calculation: Qualitative assessment based on deliverable innovation content and stakeholder feedback on improvement recommendations
data.remediation: If improvement opportunities not identified: Conduct innovation workshop, review industry best practices, engage with vendor partners for innovation ideas.

data.measurement_method: Contained within context of SoW deliverables. Covered within stakeholder engagement and effectiveness of collaboration assessments.
data.data_source: Innovation Register and Deliverable Quality Assessments
data.calculation: Qualitative assessment based on deliverable innovation content and stakeholder feedback on improvement recommendations
data.remediation: If improvement opportunities not identified: Conduct innovation workshop, review industry best practices, engage with vendor partners for innovation ideas.
